getSegmentIndexInTemplate

protected int getSegmentIndexInTemplate(int flags)
For now this is to identify the right buffer to use.

Parameters:
flags - read bit flags
Returns:
0 for non-paired or other rubbish which could not be reliably paired, 1 for first in pair and 2 for second in pair
